metadata.ttm:title: Final Review
metadata.ttm:desc: Once you have completed all sections of your eOffer, you will arrive at the Submitting your eOffer screen. It will ask whether you are ready to Submit. By selecting 'Yes,' you will be directed to the Final Review of eOffer screen.

div.p: After completing the Upload Documents screen
you will be asked to confirm that you are ready
to submit your eOffer.
You will still have one final opportunity to
review your offer prior to submission, click Yes to
move onto the review.
Once you make it to the final review screen you
should notice that all of the items in the left-hand
navigation have check marks next to them.
This indicates that everything has been
completed except for the submission of your offer
package.
If any of the menu items have a yellow exclamation
point, you should click that item, return to the
section, and provide the information necessary to
complete it.
It is recommended that you review each of the
attached documents for accuracy and completeness
as providing incorrect information may delay your
contract award.
Simply click the "Review" button to download a PDF
copy of each of the files.
If you find any information that is
inaccurate, simply click the link in the left hand
navigation to return to that section and replace
the incorrect information.
If everything looks correct, certify that you
have reviewed the "ORCA response" document and
understand that it will be submitted with your
eOffer.
Also, certify that you downloaded the Request for
Proposal from FBO and understand all of the
associated clauses and provisions that required
your response.
If you can answer "Yes" to each of these questions
and have reviewed your entire offer package, you
are ready to click "Continue."
